law.catch_line: Public policy as to apprenticeship and on-the-job training.

text.section: It is the public policy of this state to foster, encourage, and develop interest and training in manual and industrial arts, and to encourage the entrance into voluntary agreements of apprenticeship and on-the-job training which will equip workers for profitable employment.
Any contracts or practices which tend to stifle the opportunity as set forth in subsection (1) of this section are contrary to the public policy of this state.

law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 8, sec. 8, effective July 15, 2014. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 91, sec. 9. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1599c-30.
